title: 140 The Power of Emotional Courage to Transform Your Habits with Peter Bregman
description:
"Emotional courage is the ability to feel absolutely everything and then make a smart choice about what to do next." - Peter Bregman
If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes and more at www.lewishowes.com/140.
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
